changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "report" ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY , reporter_id BIGINT NOT NULL , offer_id BIGINT , conversation_id BIGINT , user_id BIGINT , created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , description VARCHAR(512) , type VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL , examined BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false , FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES "user" (id) , FOREIGN KEY (offer_id) REFERENCES "offer" (id) , FOREIGN KEY (reporter_id) REFERENCES "user" (id) , FOREIGN KEY (conversation_id) REFERENCES "conversation" (id) );
